meanings.sent1: The tree overhangs the fence in the backyard.
meanings.sent2: The roof overhangs the porch, providing shade.
meanings.sent3: The cat overhangs the edge of the table while trying to catch a toy.
meanings.sent4: His confidence overhangs his fear, allowing him to take risks.
meanings.sent5: The dark cloud overhangs the city, threatening rain.

meanings.definition: A projection or part that extends over something.
meanings.sent1: The balcony overhangs the street below.
meanings.sent2: The rock formation has a large overhang that provides shelter.
meanings.sent3: The overhang of the roof creates a cozy nook for reading.
meanings.sent4: The overhang of the cliff casts a shadow over the valley.
meanings.sent5: The overhang of the building shields pedestrians from the rain.
